body_html:
The GPU version for Windows is also set up for ARCH 6.1 cards. However, due to the limited build time of the free plan on Appveyor, the build won't pass at some time even if the code is without problem. For successful builds, the WHL files are exported so everyone can download.
Build Status of Windows GPU
body_text:
The GPU version for Windows is also set up for ARCH 6.1 cards. However, due to the limited build time of the free plan on Appveyor, the build won't pass at some time even if the code is without problem. For successful builds, the WHL files are exported so everyone can download.
Build Status of Windows GPU
body:
The GPU version for Windows is also set up for ARCH 6.1 cards. However, due to the limited build time of the free plan on Appveyor, the build won't pass at some time even if the code is without problem. For successful builds, the WHL files are exported so everyone can download.
Build Status of Windows GPU
[![Build status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/y6geguaq83igjh58?svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/peterjc123/pytorch-elheu)
